short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Penbox extension for Google Chrome allows you keep your Penbox data always at hand!
short.fr: Gardez vos requêtes Penbox à portée de main en les chargeant directement depuis n'importe quelle page web.
short.nl: Houd uw vragen van Penbox bij de hand door ze rechtstreeks vanaf elke webpagina op te laden

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By activating the extension from the page you are visiting, you will have access to a Penbox interface allowing you to easily copy & paste data from your Penbox requests.

The extension also allows a simple and efficient data exchange with the page you are visiting by directly injecting the data contained in Penbox into it. The reverse is also possible to allow the creation of new, pre-filled, Penbox requests with the data from your Brio Web, for example.

Release notes:
2.40: Add support for archived forms and i18n
2.38.5: Minor fixes
2.38: Various fixes
2.37: Various fixes
2.36: Minor fixes
2.35: Minor fixes
2.34: Allow customizing flow options
2.31: Improved stability
2.30: Adaptations to platform updates
2.29: Allow creating protected requests
2.28: Improved login experience
2.27: Various fixes
2.26: New "to treat" inbox
2.25: Support importing email & phone from Brio's new screens
2.24: Speedup loading of inboxes
2.23: Performance improvements
2.22: Added support for more BMS
2.21: Allow filtering based on request creator
2.20: Fix title of multi lang flows
2.19: Performance improvements
2.18: Support for multi lingual forms
2.17: Support "treated" requests status
2.16: Adapt to latest API changes
2.15: Search bar improvements
2.14: Ability to download attachments as compressed PDFs
long.fr:
En activant l'extension depuis la page que vous êtes en train de visiter, vous aurez accès à une interface Penbox permettant de copier/coller facilement les données depuis vos requêtes Penbox.

L'extension permet par ailleurs un échange de données simple et efficace avec la page que vous visitez en y injectant directement les données contenues dans Penbox. L'inverse est d'ailleurs également possible afin de permettre la création de nouvelles requêtes Penbox pré-remplies, par exemple, avec les données de votre Brio Web.

long.nl:
By activating the extension from the page you are visiting, you will have access to a Penbox interface allowing you to easily copy & paste data from your Penbox requests.

The extension also allows a simple and efficient data exchange with the page you are visiting by directly injecting the data contained in Penbox into it. The reverse is also possible to allow the creation of new, pre-filled, Penbox requests with the data from your Brio Web, for example.
